mapper.insert: insert into t_user(phone, email, `password`, salt, createTime, updateTime) values (#{phone},#{email},#{password},#{salt},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
insert into t_refresh_token(userId, refreshToken, createTime) values (#{userId},#{refreshToken},#{date})
mapper.delete: delete from t_refresh_token where userId=#{userId} and refreshToken=#{refreshToken}
mapper.select: select * from t_user where phone=#{phone} or email=#{email}
